items.title: Who We are?
items.description: Green River Intelligence and Technology is a company founded in 2010, with a focus on the market for advanced intelligence solutions and high technology, data protection and privacy solutions for Internet services, and tracking of cryptocurrency operations.

items.title:
Helping You
Grow In Every Stage.
items.description: The solutions exclusively marketed by the company aim to serve businesses and public agencies, defense and public security agencies, internal intelligence and counterintelligence agencies, legal instances, in physical and cyberspace environments.
